title: ESR Data Collection Function Block
description: This function block collects ESR data from multiple input arrays, processes them, and outputs a combined array of valid ESR data. It supports a reset functionality to initialize the output position.
name: ESR_COLLECT

input.name: ESR_0
input.description: First array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_1
input.description: Second array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_2
input.description: Third array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_3
input.description: Fourth array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_4
input.description: Fifth array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_5
input.description: Sixth array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_6
input.description: Seventh array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: ESR_7
input.description: Eighth array of ESR data containing up to 4 elements.

input.name: rst
input.description: A boolean flag to reset the output position.

output.name: ESR_OUT
output.description: Output array containing up to 32 collected ESR data elements.

in/out.name: pos
in/out.description: Current position index for output storage, can be modified to determine where to place the next valid ESR data.
